title: How do I change the message font size?
answer:
For phones using EMUI 2.0 or above: when viewing a conversation, pinch two fingers together to decrease the message font size. Spread two fingers apart to increase the font size. This only changes the message font size.

For phones using a system earlier than EMUI 2.0: when changing the system font size, the message font size will also change accordingly. Both the system font size and the message font size are changed.
